name: Thaum
description: You are a fledgling Thaumaturge who has set out on a trial to fulfill you dream to become the greatest wizard the world has ever known. The Chambers of Magic before you hold great secrets and great dangers. There are few who venture into these chambers, and even fewer that return, but all who emerge do so with an unquestionably deep understanding of the magical arts. You have learned but one spell, the magic missile, and believe the Chambers of Magic should be a quick way to learn more and achieve greatness.
